author: leggat
body:
Major changes in this PR:
1) Online summary map is now only 6 bins (4 layers, 2 rings) instead of the more granular offline map,
2) Dead ROC summary map is now a 6 bin histogram containing the fraction of dead channels per layer/disk (both online and offline),
3) Dead ROC summary sets an error in a bin in the online summary map if a bin is below the threshold set up in the python configuration file,
4) Offline dead ROC trend plots are now TProfiles instead of TH1Fs,
5) Added in a check into the online fillTrendPlots method to only fill the MEs if there are at least 100 clusters in the event. This avoids extraneous data, particularly in the dead ROC trend plots.
title: Changes to pixel summary class
